verses.verse: But <WG1722> In <WG1161> Those <WG3588> <WG2250> Days <WG3778> Multiplying <WG4129> The <WG3588> Disciples <WG3101> There Arose <WG1096> A Murmuring <WG1112> Of The <WG3588> Hellenists <WG1675> Against <WG4314> The <WG3588> Hebrews, <WG1445> Because <WG3754> Were Overlooked <WG3865> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Ministration <WG1248> <WG3588> Daily <WG2522> <WG3588> Widows. <WG5503> Their <WG846>

<WG4341> And Having Called To Them <WG1161> The <WG3588> Twelve <WG1427> The <WG3588> Multitude <WG4128> Of The <WG3588> Disciples, <WG3101>, Said, <WG2036> Not <WG3756> Seemly <WG701> It Is For <WG2076> Us, <WG2248> Leaving <WG2641> The <WG3588> Word <WG3056> <WG3588> Of God, <WG2316> To Attend <WG1247> Tables. <WG5132>

Look Out <WG1980>, Therefore, <WG3767> Brethren, <WG80> Men <WG435> From Among <WG1537> Yourselves, <WG5216> Born Witness To <WG3140> Seven, <WG2033> Full <WG4134> Of The Spirit <WG4151> Holy <WG40> And <WG2532> Wisdom, <WG4678> Whom <WG3739> We Will Appoint <WG2525> Over <WG1909> <WG3588> This <WG5532> Business; <WG3778>
<WG2249> But We <WG1161> To <WG3588> Prayer <WG4335> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Ministry <WG1248> Of The <WG3588> Word <WG3056> Will Steadfastly Continue. <WG4342>

And <WG2532> Was Pleasing <WG700> The <WG3588> Saying <WG3056> Before <WG1799> All <WG3956> The <WG3588> Multitude; <WG4128> And <WG2532> They Chose <WG1586> Stephen, <WG4736> A Man <WG435> Full <WG4134> Of Faith <WG4102> And The <WG2532> Spirit <WG4151> Holy, <WG40> And <WG2532> Philip, <WG5376> And <WG2532> Prochorus, <WG4402> And <WG2532> Nicanor, <WG3527> And <WG2532> Timon, <WG5096> And <WG2532> Parmenas, <WG3937> And <WG2532> Nicolas <WG3532> A Proselyte <WG4339> Of Antioch, <WG491>
Whom <WG3739> They Set <WG2476> Before <WG1799> The <WG3588> Apostles; <WG652> And <WG2532> Having Prayed <WG4336> They Laid <WG2007> On Them <WG846> <WG3588> Hands. <WG5495>

And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Word <WG3056> Of <WG3588> God <WG2316> Increased, <WG837> And <WG2532> Was Multiplied <WG4129> The <WG3588> Number <WG706> Of The <WG3588> Disciples <WG3101> In <WG1722> Jerusalem <WG2419> Exceedingly, <WG4970> <WG4183> And A Great <WG5037> Multitude <WG3793> Of The <WG3588> Priests <WG2409> Were Obedient <WG5219> To The <WG3588> Faith. <WG4102>

<WG4736> And Stephen, <WG1161> Full <WG4134> Of Faith <WG4102> And <WG2532> Power, <WG1411> Wrought <WG4160> Wonders <WG5059> And <WG2532> Signs <WG4592> Great <WG3173> Among <WG1722> The <WG3588> People. <WG2992>

<WG450> And Arose <WG1161> Certain <WG5100> Of Those <WG3588> Of <WG1537> The <WG3588> Synagogue <WG4864> <WG3588> Called <WG3004> Libertines, <WG3032> And <WG2532> Of Cyrenians, <WG2956> And <WG2532> Of Alexandrians, <WG221> And <WG2532> Of Those <WG3588> From <WG575> Cilicia <WG2791> And <WG2532> Asia, <WG773> Disputing <WG4802> With <WG3588> Stephen. <WG4736>
And <WG2532> They Were <WG3756> Not Able <WG2480> To Resist <WG436> The <WG3588> Wisdom <WG4678> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Spirit <WG4151> By Which <WG3739> He Spoke. <WG2980>

Then <WG5119> They Suborned <WG5260> Men, <WG435> <WG3004> Saying, <WG3754> We Have Heard <WG191> Him <WG846> Speaking <WG2980> Words <WG4487> Blasphemous <WG989> Against <WG1519> Moses <WG3475> And <WG2532> <WG3588> God. <WG2316>

They Stirred Up <WG4787> And <WG5037> The <WG3588> People <WG2992> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Elders <WG4245> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Scribes, <WG1122> And <WG2532> Coming Upon <WG2186> They Seized <WG4884> Him, <WG846> And <WG2532> Brought <WG71> Him To <WG1519> The <WG3588> Sanhedrim, <WG4892>

<WG2476> And They Set <WG5037> Witnesses <WG3144> False, <WG5571> Saying, <WG3004> <WG3588> Man <WG444> This <WG3778> Does <WG3756> Not Cease <WG3973> Words <WG4487> Blasphemous <WG989> Speaking <WG2980> Against <WG2596> <WG3588> Place <WG5117> <WG3588> Holy <WG40> This <WG5127> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Law; <WG3551>

We Have Heard <WG191> For <WG1063> Him <WG846> Saying, <WG3004> That <WG3754> Jesus <WG2424> The <WG3588> Nazarene <WG3480> This <WG3778> Will Destroy <WG2647> <WG3588> This <WG5117> Place, <WG5126> And <WG2532> Will Change <WG236> The <WG3588> Customs <WG1485> Which <WG3739> Delivered <WG3860> To Us <WG2254> Moses. <WG3475>

And <WG2532> Looking Intently <WG816> On <WG1519> Him <WG846> All <WG537> Who <WG3588> Sat <WG2516> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Sanhedrim <WG4892> Saw <WG1492> <WG3588> Face <WG4383> His <WG846> As The <WG5616> Face <WG4383> Of An Angel. <WG32>
